rooms.name: entrance hall
rooms.description: A welcoming entrance with a foyer that adheres to Vastu principles by aligning the main door towards the north or east. Features natural lighting and ventilation.

rooms.name: living room
rooms.description: A spacious Mediterranean-style living area with exposed stone accents, large windows for natural light and a view, and comfortable seating arrangement. Decorated with local art.

rooms.name: dining area
rooms.description: A designated dining space integrated with the living room. Features a central dining table and ambient lighting to create an inviting atmosphere.

rooms.name: kitchen
rooms.description: A modern Mediterranean kitchen with ample counter space and island central design. Adheres to local building norms and incorporates Vastu principles for efficient workflow.

rooms.name: master_bedroom
rooms.description: Luxurious master bedroom designed with a view in mind and incorporating Vastu principles. Features walk-in closet and an ensuite bathroom.

rooms.name: ensuite_bathroom
rooms.description: Private bathing area attached to the master bedroom, with a dual vanity setup and natural light.

rooms.name: servant_quarters
rooms.description: Dedicated space for domestic help featuring minimalistic design but ensuring comfort. Follows local building norms and Vastu recommendations.

rooms.name: home_theater
rooms.description: A state-of-the-art home theater integrated into the living area for entertainment purposes. Designed with acoustics and lighting that complement a Mediterranean aesthetic.

rooms.name: guest_bedroom
rooms.description: Well-appointed guest bedroom designed to ensure comfort for visitors. Adheres to Vastu principles by maintaining directional orientation.

rooms.name: utility_room
rooms.description: Functional utility room that houses laundry and storage spaces. Designed to ensure proper ventilation and easy accessibility from the kitchen.

openings.description: Main door aligned with Vastu principles and local norms, ensuring the flow of positive energy. Constructed with natural materials.
Window openings providing ample natural light and ventilation to living areas and master bedroom.
Sliding doors for the kitchen leading to a patio, ensuring smooth transition between indoor and outdoor spaces.
